args: Man, these steamed buns are good.\nGet to eatin'! It's on me!
Anyway, where were we...? Oh right,\nthe big adventure. Yeah, so Sha Wujing\nand me were headin' out to find the relic.
It was way off at the far edge of nowhere,\nand surrounded by fiends, to boot.
But when we arrived, we met someone\nthat you know all too well...
Is this Jiu Chi Dingba thing REALLY\nat the top of these mountains?
Who knows? Ah, but where is the joy in\nlife without a few unexpected surprises?
If we came all this way for nothing,\nI swear that I'm gonna... Huh?

O power universal, hear my decree!
With invisible admonitions and
unshakable binding, strong and
swift may you invoke your gift!
Hmm... At this rate, night will arrive\nbefore I reach the mountain's peak.
She took out all those fiends...\nI've never seen a power like that!
Is that a relic you have there,\nmy good lady? I must see it!

That's the Feng Mu Jie Zhang, isn't it?
I must know EVERYTHING ABOUT IT!
How does it work? How do you wield it?
Slake my thirst with your knowledge!
Huh. If a relic can do that, maybe I\nwas wrong to dismiss 'em so quick...
More fiends! Is there no end to this?
Allow meâ€”least I can do after you\ntook out all of those fiends earlier.\n...C'mere, you! Hah! Hah! Haaaaagh!
Ugh. This is taking FAR too long.\nI shall dispatch all of them at once!
Uh oh. Hold your breath, lady!
How did you like my Poisonfeather Mist?\nHeh heh heh!
You damn idiot! You almost paralyzed US!
But I didn't, so there's no need to\npitch a fit.
HmmMMM... It seems my mist wasn't\nnearly as effective as I'd hoped on fiends.\nClearly I have more work to do.
Why do you sound so composed when\nall you've done is make 'em angrier?!
Hold your tongues, both of you!\nThe fiends are about to attack!
...And that's how we first came to meet\nXuan Zang. By the time we'd finished\noff the fiends, the sun had gone down.
Okay, I think we can eat this, so...\nDamn it, Sha Wujing! Will you quit\ninterrogating that lady already?!

But she's one of the legendary Qilin!
They created the relics in the first place!
I have so much I wish to ask her that
my flesh QUIVERS with excitement!
This man's interest in relics borders\non a dangerous obsession...
Incidentally, what brings the two of you\nto these mountains in the first place?
(This lady said her job is sealing relics,\nso we probably don't want her finding out\nwhat we're REALLY doin' here...)

We work on weapon research and
development in Taiwu, and the remote
nature of this region makes it perfect
for testing. ...Isn't that right, Zhu Bajie?
Uh, yeaaah. I'm all about...um...research.\nBut enough about the two of usâ€”\nwhat are YOU doin' here?
I am returning from sealing a relic\nlocated at the top of this mountain.
What?! So you mean we came all\nthis damn way for... Oh crap.

I suspected that was your true purpose.
Hear me well: There are many relics too
dangerous for any human, and the
Jiu Chi Dingba is one of them.
If you seek to obtain it, it is my duty\nas a sealer to stop you.
Sorry, but I need that relic.
As I see it, a person's worth is based on\nwhat they achieve in their lifetime.

Well, during the recent rebellion in Taiwu,
I tried to do something great. But the damn
cowards who came with me all gave up,
so it was nothin' but a big fat failure.

I've heard of this rebellion. Did it not end
with the emperor changing his heart and
the people being saved? I would think
that an achievement worthy of respect.
It ain't worthy of squatâ€”not when\nwe coulda done so much MORE.
And what, pray tell, does all of this\nhave to do with my relic?

I learned during the rebellion that no
matter how high you aim, it's useless
if the people you fight with don't have
the stones to see it through.

But if I have that relic, I don't need to
rely on anyoneâ€”I can take on a whole
damn army by myself! THAT'S how I'm
gonna really achieve something!
I see. You believe that what matters most\nis what a person achieves during their life.\nIn truth, this is a fine way of thinking.
However, what SPECIFIC goal will\nyou seek to achieve with this relic?\nHow do you wish to change the world?
Will without vision is just another kind of\ndelusion. Your words SEEM reasonable,\nbut all you really want is to play the hero.
I cannot permit someone like you to\ntouch the relic. You must leave this\nplace as soon as the dawn breaks.
You really don't know me if you think\nI'm just gonna turn around and leave\nnow, lady. Because lemme tell youâ€”
She is right, Zhu Bajie. The relic would\nbe wasted on you. We should go.
I deeply apologize, my dear friend.\nI should never have put the idea into\nyour sweaty noggin in the first place.
And yet, dear sealer, my friend here left\nhis dear wife behind to come all this way.\nCould he not at least SEE the relic?
...Very well. We depart for the peak\nas soon as the sun rises.
There now! That's better than nothing,\nis it not?
You know, even when I know you're\nlying, your apologies are STILL creepy.
There's no time for banter!\nWe must act before she wakes.
We hurried up the mountain as Xuan Zang slept,\nand when the new day dawned, we found the\nJiu Chi Dingba embedded in rock inside a cave.
At last! ...HmmMMM. I must say,\nI did not expect it to look like an\nordinary garden hoe.
This thing was a real bear to pull out!\nYou actually think it can summon forth\nwinds and flames and all that?
It certainly canâ€”and I fear it will bring\nabout great tragedy if misused.
Bah! How'd she catch up so fast?!
Then I will take it by force.
Bwa ha ha ha! Just try it, lady! Hell,\nit'll give me the perfect chance to see\njust what this little baby can do.
You pernicious fool! If you summon wind\nand flame in narrow crack of a place like\nthis, we will ALL be in grave danger!
Now stand aside and let my sweet\nPoisonfeather Mist win the day!
Ah! I must hold my breath!
...Curses! That was a mere smoke bomb!
Bwaaa ha ha! I bet she's feeling\nREAL dumb right about now!
Now the relic's finally oursâ€”\nand I can't WAIT to try it out.

With the relic in our hands, we set off for the
northern continentâ€”unaware of the tragedy
that could have been avoided if we had just
handed it over to Xuan Zang...
